attributes.action: Re-open the Disney shop in town
attributes.additional_details:
I would like you to do this because it was a very great shop that bought a lot of joy and fun to many different people. I have a lot a fantastic memory's in that shop. 
Help make many memories for family's!
attributes.background: I would like you guys to try and bring back the disney shop that sadly closed on September 12 2021

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about shop openings and closures are a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
